list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: feel or express a strong desire or hope for something that is not easily attainable; want something that cannot or probably will not happen.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi mong muốn hòa bình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a desire or hope for something to happen.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the union has reiterated its wish for an agreement
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Liên minh đã nhắc lại mong muốn của nó cho một thỏa thuận
